about.title: About
about.description_1: Hello! My name is Welder and I'm a Front-end Developer with 2 years of experience specializing in creating fast and fluid visual interfaces. I focus on impactful solutions using:
about.description_2: Experience in code review, legacy updates, and applying Clean Code. Agile with Scrum.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here, you will learn about the projects I have participated in. By clicking on the cards, you will see a modal with more details about each amazing project!

instagram_app.title: Instagram App
instagram_app.description: Instagram project with the ability to switch between dark and light themes, as well as an app that consumes a photo API.

burger_app.title: Burger App
burger_app.description: App to place burger orders, with two screens and transitions between them, as well as the ability to delete orders.

weather_forecast.title: Weather Forecast
weather_forecast.description: A website that consumes a weather API by city and shows current weather information and forecasts for the next 5 days.

login_fotografia.title: Login with Photography theme
login_fotografia.description: Project made for a job application, which helped me land my first job.

login_dark.title: Login with Dark theme
login_dark.description: A simple and refined login screen made with HTML and CSS.

landing_halloween.title: Landing Page with Halloween theme
landing_halloween.description: Project to test my skills with animation and responsiveness.

login_black_white.title: Black and White Login Page
login_black_white.description: Site with simple transition animation and button links.

landing_padaria.title: Bakery Landing Page
landing_padaria.description: Website made to practice my styling skills, with email sending API implementation.
